item.title: Michael Reagan, the eldest son of President Ronald Reagan, dies at 80
item.description: Michael Reagan, the eldest son of President Ronald Reagan and a conservative commentator, has died. He was 80.

item.title: Trump, Democrats compete to cement Jan. 6 narrative
item.description: President Trump and Democrats waged a fight Tuesday over what the history books say about the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol.
